text:
After a series of questions and rumors around who will play the lead opposite Irrfan Khan in Hindi Medium 2, we finally have a solid answer! According to agency reports, Kareena Kapoor Khan has been roped in opposite Irrfan Khan in the film.
However, there is still no assurance on whether Kareena will just have an extended cameo or a full-fledged role in the film.
Twitter
Irrfan's film will be a Homi Adajania-directed venture and Bebo has finalized her dates and will join the cast and crew by May-end during the London schedule.
Twitter
Reports further claim that Kareena isn't just excited because of the script, but she is looking forward to playing the role of a cop for the first time in two-decade-long career in Bollywood.

title: For The First Time In 19 Years, Kareena Kapoor Khan To Play A Cop In Irrfan Khan's Hindi Medium 2!
